about_the_game:
Core Rush: Dash Arena is a fast-paced, action-packed party game where players race to the core in wild arenas filled with obstacles, platforms, and chaos! Whether you're driving high-speed customizable cars or controlling quirky characters, your goal is simple but challenging: be the first to reach the core and claim victory!

Compete across a variety of vibrant arenas, each featuring unique themes and dynamic obstacles. Dash, jump, drift, and smash your way through intense races, balancing speed and strategy to outplay your opponents. Every round is a test of skill, reflexes, and adaptability as you navigate ever-changing environments designed to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Key Features:

  • Single-Player and Multiplayer Modes: Race solo or challenge up to 8 players in chaotic online matches!

  • Unique Arenas and Platforms: Experience a range of arenas with different layouts, hazards, and surprises.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: Switch between characters and vehicles, each with distinct abilities and handling.

  • Customizable Vehicles and Characters: Stand out with unique skins, car designs, and accessories.

  • Physics-Based Movement: Precise controls and realistic physics create unpredictable and exciting moments.

  • Competitive and Casual Fun: Perfect for intense competition or casual play with friends.

Whether you prefer speeding through challenging tracks or outmaneuvering your opponents on foot, Core Rush: Dash Arena delivers a thrilling, ever-evolving race to the finish. Get ready for non-stop action, unpredictable chaos, and unforgettable moments in the ultimate dash to victory!

name: Core Rush ! Dash Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: i3 7100u
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: 5600u
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Core Rush: Dash Arena is a fast-paced multiplayer party game set in chaotic arenas. Switch between cars and characters to race, jump, and dash your way to the core! Master dynamic obstacles, customize your style, and be the first to claim victory
